item.description:
Because you asked for it; let's meet on the driftway across from the Widow's Walk GOLF COURSE. We will put in the Kayays and paddle out to the SPIT (where north, south rivers and ocean merge). At low tide it is a HUMONGOUS WHITE SAND beach. great for beaching, swimming and partying! Low Tide is at 3:00PM. So we will hang out for a few hours and then head back around 5:00PM or later)... Easy paddle and very scenic!
Great trip/spot if you have never done before. Hope to see you there!

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Scituate MA Spit Kayak Trip Saturday 7/14 @ 11:30
